titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-763, by Mrs. Myrick.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 245.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 831.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/8/2004--Passed House without amendment. Waives a specified requirement of rule XIII to provide for the consideration of H.R. 4200 (National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2005).
